trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件支持的默认输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: An input method editor (IME) is a program that allows users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, by using a standard keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 输入的法编辑器 (IME) 是一个程序，允许用户通过使用标准键盘输入复杂字符和符号，如日语汉字字符。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, this property always returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 在中实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类，此属性始终返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>的控件。

trans-unit.source: Sends the specified message to the default window procedure.
trans-unit.target: 向默认窗口过程发送指定的消息。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>到进程。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size and location of the form on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Windows 桌面上的大小和窗体位置。

trans-unit.source: Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 桌面坐标相对于屏幕，其中不包括任务栏的工作区域。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate system of the desktop is pixel-based.
trans-unit.target: 桌面坐标系统是基于像素的。

trans-unit.source: If your application is running on a multiple monitor system, the coordinates of the form are the coordinates for the combined desktop.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序正在运行的多个监视器系统上，在窗体坐标是合并后的桌面的坐标。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to size and position a form relative to other forms or applications on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于调整大小和在 Windows 桌面上的位置相对于其他窗体或应用程序的窗体。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the form on the Windows desktop using desktop coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示使用桌面坐标的 Windows 桌面上窗体的边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the form on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 Windows 桌面上窗体的位置。

trans-unit.source: Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 桌面坐标相对于屏幕，其中不包括任务栏的工作区域。

trans-unit.source: The coordinate system of the desktop is pixel based.
trans-unit.target: 桌面坐标系统是基于像素。

trans-unit.source: If your application is running on a multimonitor system, the coordinates of the form are the coordinates for the combined desktop.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序正在运行的多监视器系统上，在窗体的坐标为合并后的桌面的坐标。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to position your form relative to other forms and applications on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于在 Windows 桌面上的位置相对于其他窗体和应用程序窗体。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A> method, your form will be positioned at its default location, which is determined by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>之前调用的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A>方法，你的窗体将定位在其默认位置中，该域由操作系统。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about window positioning, see the "Window Size and Position" section of the "Window Features" document in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关窗口定位的详细信息，请参阅 http://msdn.microsoft.com/library 上 MSDN 库中的"窗口功能"文档"窗口大小和位置"部分。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A> after calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A>, your form will be positioned at the location you specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>之后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A>，你的窗体将位于你指定的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.SetDesktopLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the location of the form on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，表示桌面上窗体的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the dialog result for the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体的对话框结果。

trans-unit.source: The dialog result of a form is the value that is returned from the form when it is displayed as a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的对话框结果是它显示为模式对话框时，从窗体返回的值。

trans-unit.source: If the form is displayed as a dialog box, setting this property with a value from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> enumeration sets the value of the dialog box result for the form, hides the modal dialog box, and returns control to the calling form.
trans-unit.target: 如果该窗体显示为对话框中，设置此属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>枚举设置窗体的对话框结果的值，隐藏模式对话框，并将控制权返回给调用窗体。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control on the form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常由设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>窗体上的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is assigned to the DialogResult property of the form.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制分配给值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>分配给窗体的 DialogResult 属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button.DialogResult%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X in the top-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the DialogResult property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体显示为模式对话框中时，单击**关闭**按钮 （带有中窗体的右上角的 X 按钮） 将导致要隐藏的窗体和 DialogResult 属性设置为`DialogResult.Cancel`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> method is not automatically called when the user clicks the **Close** button of a dialog box or sets the value of the DialogResult property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>方法时不会自动调用用户单击**关闭**的对话框中的按钮或设置 DialogResult 属性的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the form is hidden and can be shown again without creating a new instance of the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 相反，窗体区域不可用，可以再次显示而无需创建对话框中的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Because of this behavior, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A> method of the form when the form is no longer needed by your application.
trans-unit.target: 由于此行为，必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A>时窗体应用程序不再需要该窗体的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine how a dialog box is closed in order to properly process the actions performed in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定如何将对话框中关闭以便正确处理在对话框中执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can override the value assigned to the DialogResult property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the DialogResult property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event of the form.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以重写的值分配给 DialogResult 属性，当用户单击**关闭**DialogResult 属性设置中的事件处理程序按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>窗体的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is displayed as a modeless window, the value returned by the DialogResult property might not return a value assigned to the form because the form's resources are automatically released when the form is closed.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>显示为无模式窗口，DialogResult 属性返回的值可能不返回值分配给窗体，因为关闭窗体时自动释放窗体的资源。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> that represents the result of the form when used as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"> </xref> ，它表示窗体用作对话框中时的结果。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is outside the range of valid values.
trans-unit.target: 超出了有效的值的范围是指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使用的资源 （内存除外） 释放<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: Dispose will be called automatically if the form is shown using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用显示窗体将自动调用 dispose<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: If another method such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> is used, or the form is never shown at all, you must call Dispose yourself within your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一种方法，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>使用时，或根本永远不会显示窗体，必须在你的应用程序自行调用 Dispose。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: The border style of the form determines how the outer edge of the form appears.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的边框样式确定的外边缘的窗体的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: In addition to changing the border display for a form, certain border styles prevent the form from being sized.
trans-unit.target: 除了更改窗体的边框显示，某些边框样式阻止窗体的大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog` border style changes the border of the form to that of a dialog box and prevents the form from being resized.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog`边框样式更改为的对话框中的窗体的边框，并阻止窗体在正调整大小。

trans-unit.source: The border style can also affect the size or availability of the caption bar section of a form.
trans-unit.target: 大小或窗体的标题栏区域的可用性，还会影响的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > With the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle> style, it is impossible to resize the window below a certain minimum value, even if you have set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> to `false` and assigned a zero-length string to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Text%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle>样式，就是无法调整大小窗口下面某些最小值，即使已设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>到`false`并分配到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Text%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Text%2A>一个零长度字符串</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consider working around this by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle> style instead.
trans-unit.target: 请解决这考虑通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle>改为样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the style of border to display for the form.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle"> </xref>该对象表示要显示窗体的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_FormBorderStyle.Sizable" name="FormBorderStyle.Sizable" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_FormBorderStyle.Sizable" name="FormBorderStyle.Sizable" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is outside the range of valid values.
trans-unit.target: 超出了有效的值的范围是指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the form is closed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体后发生。

trans-unit.source: The FormClosed event occurs after the form has been closed by the user or by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: FormClosed 事件发生后由用户<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>或</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>已关闭窗体

trans-unit.source: To prevent a form from closing, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event and set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> passed to your event handler to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止关闭窗体，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>事件并设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>传递给事件处理程序`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as freeing resources used by the form and to save information entered in the form or to update its parent form.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行任务，如释放资源由窗体和保存在窗体中输入信息或更新其父窗体，你可以使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体是多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>所有 MDI 子窗体的事件引发 MDI 父窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the FormClosed events of all MDI child forms are raised before the FormClosed event of the MDI parent form is raised.
trans-unit.target: 同样，所有 MDI 子窗体的 FormClosed 事件将引发 MDI 父窗体的 FormClosed 事件之前引发。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the form is closed.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体前发生。

trans-unit.source: The FormClosing event occurs as the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: 正在关闭窗体后，将发生 FormClosing 事件。

trans-unit.source: When a form is closed, it is disposed, releasing all resources associated with the form.
trans-unit.target: 关闭窗体时，它将被释放，释放与表单关联的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: If you cancel this event, the form remains opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果您取消此事件，该窗体保持打开状态。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the closure of a form, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs> passed to your event handler to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消窗体的关闭，<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs>传递给事件处理程序`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体显示为模式对话框中时，单击**关闭**按钮 （带有窗体的右上角的 X 按钮） 将导致要隐藏的窗体和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性设置为`DialogResult.Cancel`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> property in an event handler for the FormClosing event of the form.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写的值分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>属性，当用户单击**关闭**通过设置按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>窗体的 FormClosing 事件的事件处理中的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.DialogResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> method is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> displayed as a modeless window, you cannot call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> method to make the form visible, because the form's resources have already been released.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>显示为一个无模式窗口，则不能调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>方法，以使表单可见，因为已释放了窗体的资源。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide a form and then make it visible, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏窗体，然后将其可见，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, the FormClosing events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's FormClosing event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗体，多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体之前引发 MDI 父窗体的 FormClosing 事件引发的所有 MDI 子窗体的 FormClosing 事件。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event of the MDI parent form is raised.
trans-unit.target: 同样，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>之前，将引发事件的所有 MDI 子窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>引发 MDI 父窗体的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: Canceling the FormClosing event of an MDI child form does not prevent the FormClosing event of the MDI parent form from being raised.
trans-unit.target: 取消 MDI 子窗体 FormClosing 事件不会阻止引发 MDI 父窗体的 FormClosing 事件。

trans-unit.source: However, canceling the event will set to `true` the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs> class that is passed as a parameter to the parent form.
trans-unit.target: 但是，取消该事件将设置为`true`<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs>作为参数传递到父窗体的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To force all MDI parent and child forms to close, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `false` in the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制所有 MDI 父和子窗体关闭，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`false`在 MDI 父窗体。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size when autoscaling the form based on a specified font.
trans-unit.target: 获取时根据自动缩放窗体指定的字体的大小。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The GetAutoScaleSize method is obsolete in.NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]1> GetAutoScaleSize 方法是过时在.net Framework 2.0 版。

trans-unit.source: This member has been retained for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 此成员已保留用于向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic scaling, see [Automatic Scaling in Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关自动缩放的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体中的自动缩放](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine the size a form would autoscale to for a specific font before applying the font to the form.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定窗体将字体应用于窗体之前将自动缩放到特定字体的大小。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine the size a form is autoscaled to based on the font currently assigned to the form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定大小的形式是自动缩放到基于当前分配给窗体的字体，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScaleBaseSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> representing the font to determine the autoscaled base size of the form.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>表示确定窗体的自动缩放基大小的字体。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> representing the autoscaled size of the form.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref>表示窗体的自动缩放大小。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 检索缩放控件时的边界。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>指定为其检索在显示器边界的区域。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 高度和宽度的控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: 值之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> ，指定要定义其大小和位置时使用的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示在其中缩放控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Help button should be displayed in the caption box of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应在窗体的标题框中显示帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, a small button with a question mark appears in the caption bar to the left of the **Close** button.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，问号的小按钮将出现在左侧的标题栏中**关闭**按钮。

trans-unit.source: You can use this button to display help for your application.
trans-unit.target: 此按钮可用于显示有关你的应用程序的帮助。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class to display Help information to the user when the Help button of the form is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类来单击的窗体帮助按钮时，向用户显示帮助信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HelpRequested>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The value of the HelpButton property is ignored if the **Maximize** or **Minimize** buttons are shown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 帮助按钮属性的值将忽略如果**最大化**或**最小化**显示按钮。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display a Help button in the form's caption bar; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the **Help** button is clicked.

trans-unit.target: HelpButtonClicked 事件发生时**帮助**单击窗体的标题栏中的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The **Help** button is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.HelpButton%2A> property is set to `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon for the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体的图标。

trans-unit.source: A form's icon designates the picture that represents the form in the taskbar as well as the icon that is displayed for the control box of the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的图标指定表示任务栏，以及此图标显示为在窗体控件框中的窗体中的图片。

trans-unit.source: This property will have no effect if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将产生任何影响，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the form will not display an icon.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，窗体将不会显示一个图标。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> that represents the icon for the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> ，它表示窗体的图标。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the input language of the form has changed.
trans-unit.target: 更改窗体的输入的语言后发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to make changes to your form's appearance and text based on changes made to the input language of the form.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于对表单的外观和基于窗体的输入语言所做的更改的文本进行更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user attempts to change the input language for the form.
trans-unit.target: 当用户尝试更改窗体的输入的语言时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the change of input language is made for the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体进行的输入语言更改之前，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the language change by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> passed to your event handler to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置取消语言更改<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs>传递给事件处理程序`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the event is canceled, the input language is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果取消了该事件，不会更改输入的语言。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to determine whether the requested input language change is appropriate for your application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件以确定请求的输入的语言更改是否适合你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) child form.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示窗体是否为多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: At run time, MDI child forms are displayed inside the client area of an MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，MDI 子窗体将显示在一个 MDI 父窗体工作区。

trans-unit.source: An MDI child form can be maximized, minimized, and moved within the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 可以最大化、 最小化，和 MDI 父窗体中移动的 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: To create an MDI child form, assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that will be the MDI parent form to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A> property of the child form.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的 MDI 子窗体，将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>将到 MDI 父窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A>子窗体的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> property to determine whether a form is an MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>属性来确定窗体是 MDI 父窗体。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the IsMdiChild property to determine whether a form returned by a method or property is an MDI child form or a standard form in your application such as a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: IsMdiChild 属性可用于确定返回由方法或属性的窗体是 MDI 子窗体或在你的应用程序，如对话框中的标准窗体。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All MDI child forms have sizable borders, a control-menu box, and Minimize and **Maximize** buttons, regardless of the settings of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 所有 MDI 子窗体具有可调整大小的边框、 一个控件菜单框中和最小化和**最大化**按钮，而不考虑的设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MaximizeBox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MinimizeBox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ControlBox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the form is an MDI child form; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果窗体是 MDI 子窗体;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form is a container for multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示窗体是否为多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体的容器。

trans-unit.source: This property changes the display and behavior of the form to an MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性更改为一个 MDI 父窗体的显示和行为的窗体。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the form displays a sunken client area with a raised border.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，窗体显示具有凸起边框的凹陷工作区。

trans-unit.source: All MDI child forms assigned to the parent form are displayed within its client area.
trans-unit.target: 分配给父窗体的所有 MDI 子窗体将都显示在其工作区内。

trans-unit.source: When an MDI parent form is closed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当关闭 MDI 父窗体时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>所有 MDI 子窗体的事件引发 MDI 父窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> events of all MDI child forms are raised before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> event of the MDI parent form is raised.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>之前，将引发事件的所有 MDI 子窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>引发 MDI 父窗体的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closed>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on an MDI child form, setting IsMdiContainer to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果有两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>将 IsMdiContainer 设置为的 MDI 子窗体上的控件`true`父窗体将只有其中一个的内容合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> to merge the contents of additional child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A>其他子的内容合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>MDI 父窗体上的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the form is a container for MDI child forms; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果窗体是 MDI 子窗体; 的容器否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the form can use all windows and user input events without restriction.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示窗体是否可以使用所有窗口和不受限制的用户输入的事件。

trans-unit.source: The IsRestrictedWindow property determines whether the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow> permission is granted.
trans-unit.target: IsRestrictedWindow 属性确定是否<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>授予权限。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>

trans-unit.source: This property is set at run time in the form's constructor, and is cached for the lifetime of the form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置在窗体的构造函数中的运行时，窗体的生存期内缓存。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms applications running in partial trust cannot circumvent this check, as the common language runtime ensures that the parent constructor is always called in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 在部分信任环境中运行的 Windows 窗体应用程序不能避开此检查，因为公共语言运行时可确保，在部分信任情况下始终调用父构造函数。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the form has restrictions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果窗体有限制;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form will receive key events before the event is passed to the control that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示窗体是否将接收此键事件之前的事件传递到具有焦点的控件。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the form will receive all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，窗体将接收所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: After the form's event handlers have completed processing the keystroke, the keystroke is then assigned to the control with focus.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的事件处理程序已完成处理击键后，键击然后指派给具有焦点的控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the KeyPreview property is set to `true` and the currently selected control is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, after the keystroke is handled by the event handlers of the form the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control will receive the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 KeyPreview 属性设置为`true`和当前选择的控件是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>之后由窗体的事件处理程序处理击键,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件将接收已按下的键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not allow controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in your form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event handler to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不允许控件接收到键盘事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中窗体的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件处理程序`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to process most keystrokes in your application and either handle the keystroke or call the appropriate control to handle the keystroke.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于处理大多数击键中你的应用程序并可以处理键击或调用来处理击键的相应控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, when an application uses function keys, you might want to process the keystrokes at the form level rather than writing code for each control that might receive keystroke events.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当应用程序使用功能键，你可能想要处理窗体级别，而不是为每个控件都可能会收到击键事件编写代码。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a form has no visible or enabled controls, it automatically receives all keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果窗体不具有任何可见或启用的控件，它会自动获得所有键盘事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A control on a form may be programmed to cancel any keystrokes it receives.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可能对窗体上的控件进行编程，从而取消它接收任何击键。

trans-unit.source: Since the control never sends these keystrokes to the form, the form will never see them regardless of the setting of KeyPreview.
trans-unit.target: 由于控件永远不会将这些击键发送到窗体，该窗体将不会看到它们 KeyPreview 的设置无关。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the form will receive all key events; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the currently selected control on the form receives key events.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果窗体将接收所有键事件，则<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果窗体上的当前选定的控件接收键事件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms within the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 排列多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体在 MDI 父窗体内。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to arrange the MDI child forms in your MDI parent form to allow for easier navigation and manipulation of MDI child forms.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于在 MDI 父窗体，以便更轻松导航和操作的 MDI 子窗体中排列 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: MDI child forms can be tiled horizontally and vertically, cascaded, or as icons within the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: MDI 子窗体可以平铺水平和垂直，级联，或者显示为在 MDI 父窗体内的图标。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MdiLayout"></xref> values that defines the layout of MDI child forms.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MdiLayout"></xref>定义 MDI 子窗体的布局的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a form is displayed for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 第一次显示一个窗体前发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as allocating resources used by the form.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用于执行任务，例如分配由窗体的资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>表示的左上角<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>以屏幕坐标。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Point> is a structure, which means that it is a value type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Point>是一种结构，这意味着它是值类型。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: If you access a property in <xref:System.Drawing.Point>, a copy of the property is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果访问中的属性<xref:System.Drawing.Point>，返回的属性的副本。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changing the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point> returned from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property will not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> property values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，更改<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Drawing.Point>从返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>属性将不会影响<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A>属性值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust these properties, set each property value individually, or set the Location property with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整这些属性，分别设置每个属性值，或设置具有新<xref:System.Drawing.Point>。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>的位置属性

trans-unit.source: The Location property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.SettingsBindableAttribute.Bindable%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 位置属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>基类，并设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.SettingsBindableAttribute.Bindable%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.SettingsBindableAttribute.Bindable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>表示的左上角<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>以屏幕坐标。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the primary menu container for the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体的主菜单容器。

trans-unit.source: In addition to setting the MainMenuStrip property, you must <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the form.
trans-unit.target: 除了设置 MainMenuStrip 属性，你必须<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>控制转移到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>窗体的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> class supersedes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> class in previous versions of the .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Maximize** button is displayed in the caption bar of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否**最大化**按钮显示窗体的标题栏中。

trans-unit.source: A **Maximize** button enables users to enlarge a window to full-screen size.
trans-unit.target: A**最大化**按钮使用户得以扩大到全屏幕大小的窗口。

trans-unit.source: To display a **Maximize** button, you must also set the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> property to `FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle`, `FormBorderStyle.Sizable`, `FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D`, or `FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog`.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示**最大化**按钮，你还必须设置窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>属性`FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle`， `FormBorderStyle.Sizable`， `FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D`，或`FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A **Maximize** button automatically becomes a restore button when a window is maximized.
trans-unit.target: A**最大化**按钮自动变成一个还原按钮最大化窗口时。

trans-unit.source: Minimizing or restoring a window automatically changes the restore button back to a **Maximize** button.
trans-unit.target: 最小化或还原窗口将自动更改还原按钮返回到**最大化**按钮。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Maximizing a form at run time generates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize> event.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 最大程度地窗体，在运行时生成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A> property reflects the current state of the window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A>属性反映窗口的当前状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A> property to `FormWindowState.Maximized`, the form is maximized independently of whatever settings are in effect for the MaximizeBox and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A>属性`FormWindowState.Maximized`，窗体最大化独立于任何设置实际上适用于 MaximizeBox 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.WindowState%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要显示**最大化**按钮窗体; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取和设置窗体大小，它最大化时。

trans-unit.target: 值<> *1> 属性大于窗体的高度。 -的值<> *1> 属性大于窗体宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum size the form can be resized to.
trans-unit.target: 获取窗体可调整到的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to limit the size of a form to a specified maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可限制为指定的最大大小的窗体的大小。

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature when displaying multiple windows at the same time, to ensure that a single window does not cause other windows to be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此功能，同时显示多个窗口时以确保单个窗口不会导致其他窗口来隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object that is 0 in height and 0 in width, the form will have no maximum size beyond the limits set by Windows.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为<xref:System.Drawing.Size>是 0 高度和宽度，窗体中的为 0 的对象将具有由 Windows 设置的限制之外没有最大大小。</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the maximum size for the form.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>表示窗体的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: The values of the height or width within the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> object are less than zero.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a multiple-document interface (MDI) child form is activated or closed within an MDI application.
trans-unit.target: 激活或关闭 MDI 应用程序中的多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as updating the contents of the MDI child form and changing the menu options available in the MDI parent form based on the status of the MDI child form that is activated.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来执行任务，如更新 MDI 子窗体的内容和更改的菜单选项 MDI 父窗体中提供基于状态的已激活 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of forms that represent the multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms that are parented to this form.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示此窗体的多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体作为父级的窗体的数组。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to obtain references to all the MDI child forms currently opened in an MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，可获取对所有 MDI 子窗体在 MDI 父窗体中当前打开的引用。

trans-unit.source: To create an MDI child form, assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that will be the MDI parent form to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A> property of the child form.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的 MDI 子窗体，将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>将到 MDI 父窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A>子窗体的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiParent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to loop through all the MDI child forms to perform operations such as saving data to a database when the MDI parent form closes or to update fields on the child forms based on actions performed in your application.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于循环访问所有 MDI 子窗体来执行操作，例如将数据保存到数据库，MDI 父窗体关闭时或更新基于你的应用程序中执行的操作将子窗体上的字段。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> objects, each of which identifies one of this form's MDI child forms.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>对象，其中每个标识此窗体的 MDI 子窗体之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form of this form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此窗体的当前多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体。

trans-unit.source: To create an MDI child form, assign the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that will be the MDI parent form to the MdiParent property of the child form.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的 MDI 子窗体，将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>将子窗体的 MdiParent 属性到 MDI 父窗体。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property from an MDI child form to obtain global information that all child forms need or to invoke methods that perform actions to all child forms.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取所有子窗体都需要的全局信息或调用执行所有子窗体的操作的方法，可以使用此属性从 MDI 子窗体。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on an MDI child form, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果有两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>上设置的 MDI 子窗体的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>到`true`父窗体将只有其中一个的内容合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> to merge the contents of additional child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A>其他子的内容合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>MDI 父窗体上的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that represents the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> ，表示 MDI 父窗体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> assigned to this property is not marked as an MDI container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>分配给此属性未标记为的 MDI 容器。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> assigned to this property is both a child and an MDI container form.
trans-unit.target: -或- <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>分配给此属性是子级和的 MDI 容器窗体。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> assigned to this property is located on a different thread.
trans-unit.target: -或- <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>分配给此属性位于另一个线程。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> that is displayed in the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref>窗体中显示。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to switch between complete menu sets at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性在运行时的整个菜单集合间进行切换。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can define one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> to be displayed when your multiple-document interface (MDI) form has no active MDI child forms and another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> to display when a child window is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以定义一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>时多文档界面 (MDI) 窗体具有没有活动的 MDI 子窗体和另一个要显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>显示子窗口时显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: You can also use a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> when specific conditions exist in your application that require displaying a different menu set.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>要求显示不同的菜单集的应用程序中存在特定条件时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> that represents the menu to display in the form.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> ，表示要在窗体中显示的菜单。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the menu of a form loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 窗体菜单失去焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when you click on any menu item in a menu that results in a command being performed and the menu losing focus.
trans-unit.target: 当你单击菜单中的任何菜单项中正在执行的命令该结果和该菜单失去焦点时，引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as updating the text of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control or enabling and disabling buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来执行任务，如更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制或启用和禁用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>上的按钮</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>的文本

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when any menu item in the menu is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击菜单中的任何菜单项时，引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks such as enabling and disabling controls on the form that should not be accessed by the user when the menus are being accessed.

trans-unit.source: This property is primarily used when the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) child form that merges its menu with its parent form's menu.
trans-unit.target: 在窗体合并了其父窗体的菜单的其菜单多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗体时，主要使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the current menu structure in an MDI application to make changes or additions to the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于获取 MDI 应用程序以进行更改或元素添加到菜单结构中的当前菜单结构。

trans-unit.target: 若要获取的未合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>分配给窗体，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Menu%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this form is displayed modally.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否有模式地显示此窗体。

trans-unit.source: When a form is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form.
trans-unit.target: 有模式地显示窗体时，不需要输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 能对模式的窗体上的对象进行除外。

trans-unit.source: The program must hide or close a modal form (usually in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur.
trans-unit.target: 该程序必须隐藏或关闭模式中的窗体 （通常对某些用户执行任何操作的响应） 到另一种形式的输入之前进行。

trans-unit.source: Forms that are displayed modally are typically used as dialog boxes in an application.
trans-unit.target: 有模式地显示的窗体通常用作应用程序中的对话框。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a form that you have obtained from a method or property has been displayed modally.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定你获取从方法或属性的窗体是否已有模式地显示。

trans-unit.source: To display a form modally use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示窗体以模式方式使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the form is displayed modally; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果窗体进行模式; 显示否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The OnClosed and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnClosing%2A> methods are not called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called to exit your application.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> OnClosed 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnClosing%2A>方法不调用时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>调用方法以退出应用程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OnClosing%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity level of the form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置窗体的不透明度级别。

trans-unit.source: The Opacity property enables you to specify a level of transparency for the form and its controls.
trans-unit.target: 不透明度属性使你能够指定为窗体及其控件的透明度级别。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to a value less than 100 percent (1.00), the entire form, including borders, is made more transparent.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为小于 100%(1.00) 的值时，整个窗体中，包括边框、 进行更加透明。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to a value of 0 percent (0.00) makes the form completely invisible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为值为 0%(0.00) 使窗体完全不可见。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to provide different levels of transparency or to provide effects such as phasing a form in or out of view.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性，以提供不同级别的透明度或提供如窗体逐渐加入或退出视图的效果。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can phase a form into view by setting the Opacity property to a value of 0 percent (0.00) and gradually increasing the value until it reaches 100 percent (1.00).
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以通过设置为值为 0%(0.00) 的不透明度属性并逐渐增加的值，直至其达到 100%(1.00)，一个窗体逐渐到视图。

trans-unit.source: Opacity differs from the transparency provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A>, which only makes a form and its controls completely transparent if they are the same color as the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 不透明度不同于由提供的透明度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A>、 这只是使窗体和其控件完全透明如果它们是中指定的值与相同的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TransparencyKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是支持时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Opacity property depends on the Layered Windows API that was introduced with Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: 不透明度属性取决于分层的 Windows API 引入了在 Windows 2000 中使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Layered Windows: A New Way to Use Translucency and Transparency Effects in Windows Applications" in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅"分层 Windows:: 新方式对使用透明度和透明度效果在 Windows 应用程序"中的平台 SDK 文档[http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The level of opacity for the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的不透明度级别。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.00.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1.00。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> objects that represent all forms that are owned by this form.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数组<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>表示此窗体拥有的所有窗体的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property returns an array that contains all forms that are owned by this form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回一个数组，包含此窗体拥有的所有窗体。

trans-unit.source: To make a form owned by another form, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AddOwnedForm%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使窗体拥有的另一种形式，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AddOwnedForm%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AddOwnedForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The form assigned to the owner form will remain owned until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RemoveOwnedForm%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 分配给所有者窗体的窗体将保持拥有直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RemoveOwnedForm%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RemoveOwnedForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also make a form owned by another by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A> property with a reference to its owner form.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以通过设置拥有的另一个窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A>属性对其所有者窗体的引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Owner%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体拥有的另一种形式时，它被关闭或隐藏与所有者窗体。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑名为窗体`Form2`归名为窗体`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Form1`关闭或最小化，`Form2`也会关闭或隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form.
trans-unit.target: 附属窗体还永远不会显示在其所有者的窗体后面。

trans-unit.source: You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not be displayed behind the owner form when the owner form is selected.
trans-unit.target: 可以拥有的窗体以 windows 使用如查找和替换 windows，不应在选择所有者窗体时显示在所有者窗体。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, this property will return all forms that are displayed with the exception of any MDI child forms that are currently open.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果窗体是多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体，该属性将返回所有当前打开任何 MDI 子窗体除了显示的窗体。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the MDI child forms opened in an MDI parent form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取在 MDI 父窗体中打开的 MDI 子窗体，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.MdiChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> array that represents the owned forms for this form.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>数组，表示此窗体的附属窗体。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the form that owns this form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置拥有此窗体的窗体。

trans-unit.source: To make a form owned by another form, assign its Owner property a reference to the form that will be the owner.
trans-unit.target: 若要使窗体拥有的另一种形式，将其所有者属性分配到将成为所有者的窗体的引用。

trans-unit.source: When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form.
trans-unit.target: 当窗体拥有的另一种形式时，它被关闭或隐藏与所有者窗体。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑名为窗体`Form2`归名为窗体`Form1`。

trans-unit.source: If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden.Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Form1`关闭或最小化，`Form2`也会关闭或隐藏。附属窗体还永远不会显示在其所有者的窗体后面。

trans-unit.source: You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not disappear when the owner form is selected.
trans-unit.target: 你可以拥有的窗体以 windows 使用如查找和替换 windows，选中所有者窗体时应不会消失。

trans-unit.source: To determine the forms that are owned by a parent form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OwnedForms%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定属于父窗体的窗体，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OwnedForms%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.OwnedForms%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that represents the form that is the owner of this form.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> ，表示此窗体的所有者的窗体。

trans-unit.source: A top-level window cannot have an owner.
trans-unit.target: 顶级窗口不能有一个所有者。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 处理命令键。

trans-unit.source: The ProcessCmdKey method overrides the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ProcessCmdKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> implementation to provide additional handling of main menu command keys and MDI accelerators.
trans-unit.target: ProcessCmdKey 方法重写基<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ProcessCmdKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>实现以提供的主菜单命令键和 MDI 快捷键的其他处理。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ProcessCmdKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For information about trapping keystrokes, see "How to trap keystrokes in controls by using Visual C#" and "How to trap keystrokes in .NET controls by using Visual Basic .NET" in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 有关捕获击键的信息，请参阅"如何使用 Visual C# 陷阱控件中的键击"和"如何通过使用 Visual Basic.NET 陷阱.NET 控件中的键击"http://support.microsoft.com 在 Microsoft 知识库。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，按引用传递，表示要处理的 Win32 消息。

trans-unit.target: 处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey method overrides the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> implementation to provide additional handling of the RETURN and ESCAPE keys in dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: ProcessDialogKey 方法重写基<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>实现以提供的对话框中的返回和转义键的其他处理。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The method performs no processing on keystrokes that include the ALT or CONTROL modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 该方法对包括的 ALT 或控件的修饰符的击键执行不会进行处理。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
